title: GandaBERT: Luganda News Classification
description: End-to-end NLP pipeline for low-resource Luganda language achieving 85.7% accuracy

caseStudy.overview: GandaBERT is a groundbreaking NLP project that brings modern language understanding to Luganda, one of Uganda's major languages. This project addresses the critical gap in NLP tools for African languages.
caseStudy.challenge: Luganda is a low-resource language with limited NLP datasets and tools. Creating accurate text classification required building datasets from scratch and adapting multilingual models for this specific linguistic context.
caseStudy.approach: Built a novel 2,600-article dataset combining native news sources, machine translation, and synthetic data augmentation. Fine-tuned Multilingual BERT with custom preprocessing for Luganda's unique morphological features.
caseStudy.solution: The final system achieves 85.7% accuracy across 5 news categories (Politics, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Technology). Deployed as a full-stack application with FastAPI backend and Vercel frontend.
features: FastAPI REST backend with Hugging Face Inference Endpoints

title: WaterBoard Analytics Dashboard
description: Production analytics dashboard for water utilities across 4 African countries

caseStudy.overview: Built during the Equitech Futures Fellowship, this dashboard provides actionable insights for water utility companies across Uganda, Cameroon, Malawi, and Lesotho.
caseStudy.challenge: Water utilities in developing countries lack accessible tools to visualize performance metrics, track service ladder progress, and make data-driven decisions.
caseStudy.approach: Designed a role-based dashboard system with JMP service ladder visualizations, integrated AI-powered data assistant using Google Gemini for natural language queries.
caseStudy.solution: A production-ready Streamlit application with Plotly visualizations, role-based authentication, and context-aware AI chat for answering complex data questions.
features: AI data assistant powered by Google Gemini
